text:
Equal pay isn‚Äôt just a social issue.
When two people do the same work with the same skill, pay should reflect it. Anything less erodes trust, culture, and performance.

Culture is the foundation, and pay equity is one of its load-bearing walls.

#InternationalEqualPayDay

Today is International Equal Pay Day üí∞ In 2025, women working full-time earn an average of 85 cents for every dollar a man makes in the US, and women of color earn even less. Learn more about how the Reform Movement is fighting for pay equity, led by WRJ, through RPEI: wrj.org/social-justi...
